channel.title: _am1t tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from _am1t.

item.description: I love what Grammarly can do ‚Äì but boy, its Premium tier is costly. Ironically, every time it corrects me, I want to pay for the service. But then I see how much it costs & I can‚Äôt convince myself that I need it enough. I tried LanguageTool for a year, but reconsidering now.

I am tired of even the simple utility apps going for subscription model instead of right out one-time purchases. Make the app a paid app ‚Äì sure make it costlier than the subscription cost. Don‚Äôt say it‚Äôs free and present ‚ÄúSubscribe‚Äù button first thing ... https://t.co/ZUTyBrS0eU

When writing, and also when doing research for writing, it‚Äôs important to get the details right, but that doesn‚Äôt always mean what you might think. Economy of detail is usually better than excess, which raises the critical question about which details ... https://t.co/Do3cUcmtkt
Every now and then, there‚Äôs an XKCD comic which I can make no sense of. Today‚Äôs (or XKCD 2626) was such. I am not that smart you see üòÑ https://t.co/ZY7zU163oR
@mattgemmell Interesting. And I agree, it should be optimised in the other direction ‚Äî longer, but less wider is better I guess.

To be lonely, then, is to desire an absent want. It is to feel an emptiness that remains unsatisfied ‚Äî to feel isolated, in need, or abandoned, but with no one to help. Yet solitude is another thing altogether. To be solitary is to retreat into ... https://t.co/4VeNpZF6s0

I have replaced Windows on my laptop today with Linux ‚Äì basically, I installed the Lubuntu distro. But that was only because I had a bootable drive ready with Lubuntu. As I then checked for the updates on the distro, I realized so much has changed ... https://t.co/5Q44jWdbot

‚ÄúStaying up late does not give you more time. It delays the renumeration against the work your body has put in throughout the day. It might be pleasing in the moment, but it also begins a countdown towards ruining a day in the coming week for ... https://t.co/7ni6ttUS3X

I am looking forward to today‚Äôs qualifier between RR and RCB. I have always loved the play RR plays ‚Äì always the underdogs on paper, but punch above their weight. This time they are strong on paper too. I am hoping for a the first qualifier rematch in the IPL finals.

It‚Äôs best to put emoji at the very end of your written content which also means not using them as bullet points. This practice will help you avoid creating any clarity issues that could be caused by an icon‚Äôs coded description interfering with the ... https://t.co/YKVizoxXVv

I let my subscription to the Freedom service expire today. I intend to do the same for Pocket soon. I don‚Äôt get enough benefit from either of these services. Plus I am at the peak of subscription fatigue now. Am done with annual subscriptions, doesn‚Äôt matter how cheap they are.

Every time I listen to the song Daryaa from Manmarziyaan, I am reminded of the genius of Amit Trivedi. It‚Äôs such an intricate, yet equally simple song. The whole album is a masterclass. Also Lootera, Bombay Velvet, Andhadhun ‚Äì man, I am a big fan of ... https://t.co/CMhy5iXrzt

In line with one of my recent posts about writing for audience, this is a wonderful quote from Leo Tolstoy (h/t James Clear). If you care too much about being praised, in the end you will not accomplish anything serious. Let the judgments of others ... https://t.co/96GKOPeK7k
I use Firefox on Windows/iOS/Android and Safari on Mac. But the comparison that Brave publishes is effective. Browsers are sticky, there‚Äôs rarely an incentive to switch.

A smartphone with a case is just not the same device. I have never used a device without a case ever. A slippery slab of fragile glass just doesn‚Äôt feel comfortable sitting in my hand. So, I just wrap it in a case and carry it along. It gives the ... https://t.co/qnpZC38BdL

I like how the playoffs have lined up in this year‚Äôs IPL. The teams that played the best are the ones at the top. None is there that shouldn‚Äôt be. I would love a new champion this time, that means I support only one team of the remaining three ‚Äî the Gujarat Titans.

Finished reading: Dark Matter: A Novel by Blake Crouch üìö It had a brilliant premise ‚Äî unique and fascinating. However, I didn‚Äôt enjoy the many turns it took in the second half. There were a lot of moments when the book felt stretched, unnecessarily ... https://t.co/oJOP5pKLqC

Suppose China ends up invading and successfully annexing Taiwan; what would happen to the 2.7 million registered domains under .tw? Source: What happens to TLDs when their country stops existing? ‚Üí Another reason I tend to prefer a few specific TLDs. https://t.co/QWX7zaIYDO

Writing publicly, with the voice of your readers chirping at the back of your mind, is ineffective. You write for interaction ‚Äì that‚Äôs futile. Most social media posts belong to this category that. You are reined back by the voice ‚Äî you write for ... https://t.co/Aezjr25JcZ

I recently finished watching The Lincoln Lawyer on Netflix. It‚Äôs a good, bingeworthy series. Nothing‚Äôs great about it, but if all one wants is to binge a show over the weekend, this is one option. The things keep moving. No performance is painful, no side-story unbearable.

[D]esigning a language to be minimalistic, to have fewer concepts, and to choose primitives that combine well together, is a good way to make the language easier to learn. If the programming language has fewer concepts, there‚Äôs less to learn, and your ... https://t.co/v2SuWBQKdU

I recently got to know (h/t Gabriel) that ‚ÄúOn This Day‚Äù feature doesn‚Äôt work with the Paper theme. I fixed the issue ‚Äì the micro memories should load properly now. I have also fixed a few minor styling issues. The upgrade should be available in the ... https://t.co/LPhldzdLyX

I want you to know that most of your life will happen in the gray spaces between bliss and heartbreak, between having everything lock into place and having it all fall apart. That‚Äôs where the grace is. Source: Laura Dern writes to her teenage daughter ‚Üí https://t.co/hkCSCx5wJ0

I have been traveling for the past week ‚Äì rejuvenating myself amidst the nature. Relaxing on the beach. Had some wonderful rides, surrounded by dense jungles. Most of all, untouched by all the hustle bustle of the modern life. Wonder. Amazement. Serenity. https://t.co/kptC82IVDj

Who‚Äôs on first?‚Üí Abbott and Costello perform the classic ‚ÄúWho‚Äôs on first?‚Äù baseball sketch in their 1945 film ‚ÄúThe Naughty Nineties‚Äù first performed as part of their stage act. https://t.co/sXxdOzh1br
